StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMediaCardDetailReport]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgId int = null, @fy int = null, @mediaType int = null ) AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT mt.MediaType, mc.MediaCardId, mc.MediaName, mc.MediaTypeId, mc.FY, mc.Street, mc.PhoneNumber, mc.Zip_code, MCRISS.dbo.GEO_LOCATION.CITY_TEXT, MCRISS.dbo.GEO_LOCATION.STATE_TEXT, RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_ID, ms.SectorDesignator, case when mc2.MediaCardId is null then 0 else 1 end as NextFyCard FROM RSSOSS.USMC.MediaCard AS mc INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MediaType AS mt ON mc.MediaTypeId = mt.MediaTypeID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.GEO_LOCATION ON mc.City_Code = GEO_LOCATION.CITY_CODE AND mc.State_Code = GEO_LOCATION.STATE_CODE INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorZip ON mc.Zip_code = RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorZip.Zip INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector AS ms ON RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorZip.SectorID = ms.SectorID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ON ms.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.rowguid LEFT JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].MediaCard mc2 on mc.MediaName = mc2.MediaName and mc2.FY = mc.FY + 1 WHERE (mc.FY = @fy OR @fy IS NULL) AND (RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_ID = @orgId OR @orgId IS NULL) AND (mc.MediaTypeId = @mediaType OR @mediaType IS NULL)
END
